channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere Rush
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere Rush

item.title: CVE-2023-22244|2023-02-17T00:00:00 -- adobe -- premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush version 2.6 (and earlier) is affected by a Use After Free vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2023-22234|2023-02-17T00:00:00 -- adobe -- premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush version 2.6 (and earlier) is affected by a Stack-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
